name: 2021 2nd International Symposium on Artificial Intelligence for Medicine Sciences
content: The 2nd International Symposium on Artificial Intelligence for Medicine Sciencesï¼ˆISAIMS 2021) will be held during October 29-31, 2021 in Beijing, China. ISAIMS 2021 is a hybrid conference combing both in-person and virtual experience. ISAIMS 2021 mainly covers topics on Frontier technologies of AI, biometrics, intelligent medical robots, intelligent image recognition, intelligent diagnosis and treatment, intelligent health management, etc. CONTACT US Conference Secretary: Vivian Wang E-mail: isaims2020@163.com Linkedin: www.linkedin.com/in/aeicvivian Tel: +86-19139737380 (Wechat) QQ: 2644824662
organizers: National Engineering Laboratory for Medical Systems and Applications
